TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 275,000 to 293,000 head versus 284,000 week ago and 320,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 122,000 to 128,000 head versus 128,000 week ago and 138,000 a year ago. Reuter
